name: Code Cadima: chapter 1
description:
Code Cadima: Chapter 1 is a indie horror game where the player will embark on a terrifying adventure solving puzzles, escaping from enemies, and exploring. This game is still in development but Chapter 1 is now available to everyone completely free and you can play it in both English and Spanish.

If you want to follow the development of the game more closely, you can follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Kickcreator3
